CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the village of GPE , GPE region , GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of GPE against ORG No . CARDINAL - a ORG - owned enterprise - to recover salary arrears and other payments due to her .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG found in favour of the applicant ( ORG городского суда PERSON области ) and awarded her ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON исполнительной службы Новогродовского городского управления юстиции ) initiated the enforcement proceedings .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE , the applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of GPE against ORG for failure to enforce the judgment in her favour . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim , finding that no fault had been committed by ORG . The court stated that ORG had acted properly in trying to enforce the judgment of DATE . However , by a number of decisions of ORG of GPE , ORG had been prohibited from selling the property of ORG , due to the bankruptcy proceedings which had been initiated against the company .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld the judgment of the first instance court of DATE . The applicant appealed in cassation to ORG . The parties did not provide any further information about this set of proceedings .
CARDINAL . In DATE the judgment in the applicant ’s favour was enforced in full .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
